resources.string: Life is better when you play music.\u0020

It\'s me, the developer. I\'m so glad that you are reading this now. Currently, I am learning Android development and I am getting better day by day. I will try to implement every new and useful thing that I learn. If I want to make this short, Sievere is an app for you, by you! It means you can say what you want to see in future updates so I will start working on it. \u0020
It\'s open-source and you can see how it works. Also, It has a channel on Telegram which posts and suggests some good music for you.\u0020
